The '''iceologer''' was a proposed mob featured in the [[2020 Mob Vote|Mob Vote]] during [[Minecraft Live 2020]], alongside the [[moobloom]] and [[glow squid]].<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-live-vote-for-next-mob|Minecraft Live: Vote For The Next Mob|September 27, 2020|Sofia Dankis}}</ref> It would have been a hostile icy illager variant that spawned in [[Mountains|mountain biomes]] and attacked players and entities using large chunks of ice.

The iceologer received 34.8% of the votes in the first round and moved onto the second,<ref>{{tweet|mc|1312432010431016960|The Mob Vote is open! You have 20 minutes to pick your favourite: Moobloom, Iceologer or Glow Squid! Vote now!|October 3, 2020}}</ref> but then lost with 47.3% of the votes.<ref>{{tweet|mc|1312440293216727045|Moobloom is out! We’re so sorry bees, no new friend for you. It’s now a two-mob race between Iceologer and Glow Squid – and the final round of voting is open… Now!|October 3, 2020}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Sprites of Iceologers appeared as an easter egg in the [[2022 Mob Vote Event]], [[2023 Mob Vote Event]], and the [[Eerie Mojang Office Party]] server.
* The iceologer is the only mob shown dying in a community vote.
